content:
For me, I'd like to choose "The Green Violinist" 
as my reserved piece for the ball,
but Tala's new song this year is also quite nice. I'm a bit torn.

content:
The Summer Festival is in full swing,
On the last day of midsummer,
Everyone is excitedly choosing songs for the dance,

content:
We're currently having the Summer Festival event.
If you want a custom mask, please let me know your requirements in advance.
Otherwise, I might just make a special one just for you.

content:

I'm not worried at all, because I know
I'll be invited as a special guest on stage.
